titles.title: Tax Fairness for All Families Act of 2017
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an increasingly larger earned income credit for families with more than 3 children.
Tax Fairness for All Families Act of 2017

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tax Fairness for All Families Act of 2017
This bill amends the Internal Revenue Code, with respect to the earned income tax credit, to provide for an increased credit percentage for taxpayers with more than three qualifying children.
